name: HyperTrack Logistics Backend (NodeJS)
description: HyperTrack NodeJS server integration for Logistics apps

FCM_KEY.description: Push Notifications: Your Firebase Cloud Messaging Key

APN_KEY_ID.description: Push Notifications: Your Apple Push Notification (APN) Key ID

APN_CERT.description: Push Notifications: Your Apple Push Notification (APN) authentication token signing key. Paste *.p8 file contents (untouched, with new lines) in the field

APN_TEAM_ID.description: Push Notifications: Your Apple Developer account Team ID
